DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to generate initial insights into the safety and performance of the Tendyne Mitral Valve System. The study includes adult patients with symptomatic mitral regurgitation who are not suitable candidates for conventional mitral valve repair or replacement. The study will include up to 110 subjects at up to 30 centers. Follow-up evaluations will be conducted through 2 years post implantation.
DOC.brief_title: Early Feasibility Study of the Tendyne Mitral Valve System
